title: Vortex
data:
{{obsolete}}
''This page is about the monster spell. For the type of creature, see [[list of vortices]]''
{{Flavour|Turns the air near the caster into a mighty, short-lived vortex, doing tremendous damage to everyone caught in it. Those affected will also be swept up into the air and tossed around. Only the eye of the storm is a safe place, and it follows the caster. After the vortex fades, it cannot be called forth again for a short time.}}

'''Vortex''' is a monster-only spell that conjures up a weak version of [[Tornado]] centered around the caster. This deals moderate physical damage, whirls creatures counter-clockwise, and causes short-lived [[flight]]. Unlike Tornado, it only has a radius of 3 and lasts only 3 turns. 

Note that there is a bug where Vortex can send you through walls.

The following monsters cast Vortex:
*{{monsterlink|Air elemental}}

==History==
*This spell was removed in [[0.27]].
*This spell was added in [[0.21]].
